events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and want to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The customer's message includes keywords related to refund and return, so the issue is categorized under Refund.
Assigning this refund request case to the refunds team for further assistance and processing.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’ll be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and photos of the received item so we can verify the issue and proceed with your refund?
Thanks for the reply. My order number is 123456789, and I have attached the photos showing the incorrect item that arrived instead of what I ordered.
We have verified the photos and confirmed the mistake. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method immediately, which should reflect in 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick resolution and refund offer. I appreciate the prompt help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received the refund as promised. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Since we have not received any further issues from you, we will now close this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
